mapper.select: SELECT SUM(i.amount) AS amount, p.buy_date as buyDate FROM purchase p, items i WHERE p.bill_id = i.purchase_bill_id AND p.status = 1 GROUP BY p.buy_date ORDER BY p.buy_date;

SELECT (i.amount) AS y, p.buy_date as x FROM purchase p, items i, product p2, product_branch_office p3 WHERE p.bill_id = i.purchase_bill_id AND p.status = 1 AND i.product_id = p2.product_id AND p2.product_id = p3.product_product_id AND p3.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{branchId} GROUP BY p.buy_date;

# Total de ventas por sucursal SELECT b.name AS branchName, p.buy_date AS date, SUM(i.amount * pro.price) AS sale FROM purchase p, items i, product pro, product_branch_office pbo, branch_office b WHERE p.bill_id = i.purchase_bill_id AND i.product_id = pro.product_id AND pro.product_id = pbo.product_product_id AND pbo.branch_office_id_branch_office = b.id_branch_office AND p.status = 1 GROUP BY b.id_branch_office

# Total de productos comprados por sucursal SELECT b.name AS branchName, p.buy_date AS date, SUM(i.amount) AS sale FROM purchase p, items i, product pro, product_branch_office pbo, branch_office b WHERE p.bill_id = i.purchase_bill_id AND i.product_id = pro.product_id AND pro.product_id = pbo.product_product_id AND pbo.branch_office_id_branch_office = b.id_branch_office AND p.status = 1 GROUP BY b.id_branch_office
